entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLDER WITH LOWS AROUND 8 ABOVE
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 2 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 17
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 4 BELOW IN THE MORNING

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
